# pressAndHoldTouchBar

**Instance Property**

The bar that is displayed when a user press-and-holds on the popover item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var pressAndHoldTouchBar: NSTouchBar? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTouchBar] can be the same as the one used for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopoverTouchBarItem/popoverTouchBar] property, but does not have to be.

When non-`nil` this touch bar is displayed while the user holds their finger down on the collapsed representation of the popover item. When the user raises their finger, this bar disappears.

## Configuring the expanded popover

- **popoverTouchBar**: The bar displayed when this item is “popped.”
- **showsCloseButton**: A Boolean value that determines whether a close button should be shown on the popover bar.
